title: Custom CRM Integrations
summary: FlexPay offers specialized payment recovery strategies for CRMs, aiming to maximize performance for businesses struggling with recurring failed payments. Their AI-powered system analyzes over 120 data points to improve recovery rates significantly compared to traditional rule-based methods.
key_points: Specialized payment recovery strategies for CRMs
AI-powered recovery uses over 120 data points
Achieves 60-70% recovery improvements over rule-based systems
Addresses the challenge of recurring failed payments
Offers consulting and support from payment experts
